scripts.dev: concurrently "REGION=`sls output get --name region` USER_POOL=`sls output get --name userPool` USER_POOL_CLIENT=`sls output get --name userPoolClient` GATEWAY_URL='http://localhost:3000/dev' parcel frontend/index.html -d dist" "AWS_PROFILE=personal sls offline"
scripts.deploy:dev: rm -rf dist && REGION=`sls output get --name region --stage dev` USER_POOL=`sls output get --name userPool --stage dev` USER_POOL_CLIENT=`sls output get --name userPoolClient --stage dev` GATEWAY_URL=`sls output get --name gatewayUrl --stage dev` parcel build frontend/index.html -d dist && AWS_PROFILE=personal sls deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:qa: rm -rf dist && REGION=`sls output get --name region --stage qa` USER_POOL=`sls output get --name userPool --stage qa` USER_POOL_CLIENT=`sls output get --name userPoolClient --stage qa` GATEWAY_URL=`sls output get --name gatewayUrl --stage qa` parcel build frontend/index.html -d dist && AWS_PROFILE=personal sls deploy --stage qa
scripts.deploy:prod: rm -rf dist && REGION=`sls output get --name region --stage prod` USER_POOL=`sls output get --name userPool --stage prod` USER_POOL_CLIENT=`sls output get --name userPoolClient --stage prod` GATEWAY_URL=`sls output get --name gatewayUrl --stage prod` parcel build frontend/index.html -d dist && AWS_PROFILE=personal sls deploy --stage prod
